attributes.action: Help the British Citizens held at Guantanamo Bay, Give them a fair trial.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most of the detainees at Guantanamo Bay have been detained without being charged and most of them for several years. Its about time our government and our Prime Minister did something to help the people of United Kingdom. So we humbly request that you Mr. Blair, before you leave do one good deed and help out the innocent. Please.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
